IDBObjectStoreOpenCursor.summary:
The openCursor() method of the
interface returns an object,
and, in a separate thread, returns a new object.
Used for iterating through an object store with a cursor.

remarks.para:
To determine if the add operation has completed successfully, listen for the results's
success event.

IDBObjectStoreOpenCursor.returns: An object on which subsequent events related to this operation are fired.If the operation is successful, the value of the request's property is:
